snippet: A musical version of “The Nutty Professor,” adapted from Jerry Lewis’s hit 1963, will make its debut in July, ahead of a planned Broadway run.
abstract: A musical version of “The Nutty Professor,” adapted from Jerry Lewis’s hit 1963, will make its debut in July, ahead of a planned Broadway run.

headline.main: 'Nutty Professor' Musical Will Have Its Premiere in Nashville
headline.print_headline: ‘Nutty Professor’ Musical to Open in Nashville
